preference.name: AWC_visMaterial
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default object material for the Viewer in the Active Workspace client. Valid values are integers from 0 to 29. * 0 : SHINY METAL : Sets the object material to SHINY METAL * 1 : BRUSHED METAL : Sets the object material to BRUSHED METAL * 2 : SHINY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to SHINY PLASTIC * 3 : ANALYSIS : Sets the object material to ANALYSIS * 4 : FLAT : Sets the object material to FLAT. This is the default value. * 5 : RED GLOSSY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to RED GLOSSY PLASTIC * 6 : BLUE GLOSSY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to BLUE GLOSSY PLASTIC * 7 : GREEN GLOSSY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to GREEN GLOSSY PLASTIC * 8 : GRAY GLOSSY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to GRAY GLOSSY PLASTIC * 9 : BLACK GLOSSY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to BLACK GLOSSY PLASTIC * 10 : BROWN GLOSSY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to BROWN GLOSSY PLASTIC * 11 : YELLOW GLOSSY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to YELLOW GLOSSY PLASTIC * 12 : TEAL GLOSSY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to TEAL GLOSSY PLASTIC * 13 : WHITE GLOSSY PLASTIC : Sets the object material to WHITE GLOSSY PLASTIC * 14 : CLEAR PLASTIC : Sets the object material to CLEAR PLASTIC * 15 : CHROME : Sets the object material to CHROME * 16 : COPPER : Sets the object material to COPPER * 17 : GOLD : Sets the object material to GOLD * 18 : BRASS : Sets the object material to BRASS * 19 : STEEL : Sets the object material to STEEL * 20 : BRUSHED CHROME : Sets the object material to BRUSHED CHROME * 21 : BRUSHED ALUMINUM : Sets the object material to BRUSHED ALUMINUM * 22 : BRUSHED TITANIUM : Sets the object material to BRUSHED TITANIUM * 23 : GLASS : Sets the object material to GLASS * 24 : SMOKEY GLASS : Sets the object material to SMOKEY GLASS * 25 : RED PAINT : Sets the object material to RED PAINT * 26 : GRAY PAINT : Sets the object material to GRAY PAINT * 27 : BLACK PAINT : Sets the object material to BLACK PAINT * 28 : BLUE PAINT : Sets the object material to BLUE PAINT * 29 : RUBBER : Sets the object material to RUBBER
